title: Big wins for Melisa Rollins and Brendan Johnston at Belgian Waffle Ride Utah
content:
The new pro and the Aussie battle veteran BWR racers to take the top step after a characteristically challenging BWR race.

Read the full article at Big wins for Melisa Rollins and Brendan Johnston at Belgian Waffle Ride Utah on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
